room_title: Escape room "Space Station Escape (VR)" by Riddles Escape Room in Myrtle Beach
review: We did the VR space room. It was a fun experience with two teens. Be warned, however. If you get motion sick, this may not be for you. Derek was awesome to help me out when it got really bad. We would recommend it!

room_title: Escape room "Space Station Escape (VR)" by Riddles Escape Room in Myrtle Beach
review: Did the VR escape room on our couples trip- Duncan was great! We had a blast and it was enjoyed by all of us - as we all have done escape rooms in the past.

room_title: Escape room "Space Station Escape (VR)" by Riddles Escape Room in Myrtle Beach
review: We did the Escape the Space Station VR room. The owner was very friendly and explained everything very well. He put us all at ease with what we would be experiencing. Very funny and friendly guy. The VR experience was awesome. Figuring out how to escape was challenging but not impossible. It was fun to see how everyone in our group acted and what roles they played. We almost escaped..but just missed it! It was a hilarious but fun time however. Loved it. Dying to try another of their escape rooms. I highly recommend.
